DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate impact 12-week behavioral weight management program body weight quality life . We hypothesize participant lose body weight see improve quality life program completion .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Weight Management Program Body Weight Quality Life
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate weight change quality life among individual completion 12-week comprehensive group weight management program . Findings study also help program development improvement within center . The already establish weight management program call Healthy Habits Life ( HHL ) include total 14 visit ( one individual visit 12 group session ) . All patient enrol Healthy Habits Life group program Weight Center individual visit register dietitian prior begin group part standard care . At visit dietitian obtain informed consent participation research study provide subject consent participate study IWQOL-lite quality life questionnaire . After completion 12 HHL group session , patient Weight Center another individual visit dietitian review weight behavior change since initial evaluation . At visit , subject participate research study provide IWQOL-lite questionnaire fill .
